HomePage.title: Master Languages with Phrasis
HomePage.subtitle: Learn phrases, practice pronunciation, and build fluency in any language

journeySection.title: Start Your Language Journey
journeySection.description: Create an account to save your progress, track your learning, and access your phrases anywhere.

learnAtPace.title: Learn at Your Pace
learnAtPace.description: Practice phrases whenever and wherever you want

trackProgress.title: Track Your Progress
trackProgress.description: Monitor your learning journey and see how far you've come

multipleLanguages.title: Multiple Languages
multipleLanguages.description: Learn phrases in any language you choose

authCard.createAccount: Create your account and begin mastering new languages

Auth.SIGN_IN_DESCRIPTION: Enter your credentials to sign in to your account
Auth.SIGN_UP_DESCRIPTION: Create an account to get started
Auth.PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: Password must be at least 8 characters
Auth.NAME: Name
Auth.NAME_DESCRIPTION: Please enter your full name, or a display name.
Auth.FORGOT_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Enter your email to reset your password
Auth.FORGOT_PASSWORD_EMAIL: Check your email for the password reset link.
Auth.RESET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS: Your password has been reset successfully
Auth.INVALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address
Auth.EMAIL_VERIFICATION: Please check your email for the verification link.
Auth.UNEXPECTED_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
Auth.TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
Auth.MAGIC_LINK_DESCRIPTION: Enter your email to receive a magic link
Auth.MAGIC_LINK_EMAIL: Check your email for the magic link
Auth.EMAIL_OTP_DESCRIPTION: Enter your email to receive a code
Auth.EMAIL_OTP_VERIFICATION_SENT: Please check your email for the verification code.
Auth.CHANGE_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Enter your current password and a new password.
Auth.TWO_FACTOR_DESCRIPTION: Add an extra layer of security to your account
Auth.BACKUP_CODES_DESCRIPTION: Save these backup codes in a secure place. You can use them to access your account if you lose your two-factor authentication method.
Auth.PASSKEYS_DESCRIPTION: Passkeys are a secure and convenient way to sign in without passwords.
Auth.SESSIONS_DESCRIPTION: Manage your active sessions across devices.
Auth.DELETE_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Permanently remove your account and all of its contents. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.
Auth.DELETE_ACCOUNT_INSTRUCTIONS: Please confirm the deletion of your account. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.
Auth.AVATAR_DESCRIPTION: Click on the avatar to upload a custom one from your files.
Auth.AVATAR_INSTRUCTIONS: An avatar is optional but strongly recommended.
Auth.EMAIL_DESCRIPTION: Enter the email address you want to use to log in.
Auth.EMAIL_INSTRUCTIONS: Please enter a valid email address.
